description:
The End of Summer Semi Finals are here! Riku has recovered from his slump and the team is ready to win. The Honan team will face off against their long-time rival, Saisei High School.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: HIGH TOUCH 笑顔をくれた君たちへ
High Touch: Egao o Kureta Kimitachi e
High Touch: For You, Who Gave Me the Smile
